anathema: Treat grave sites irreverently, mistreat your tools, create undead, damage a soul
edict: Perfect a craft or trade, carve runes, destroy undead, aid others with completing unfinished tasks
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Magrim (The Taskmaster)](/Deities.aspx?ID=450)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 306

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Perfect a craft or trade, carve runes, destroy undead, aid others with completing unfinished tasks

**Anathema** Treat grave sites irreverently, mistreat your tools, create undead, damage a soul

**Area of Concern**
Death, fate, underworld

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

**Favored Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=403)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=109)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Metal](/Domains.aspx?ID=112), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=118)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Temporary Tool](/Spells.aspx?ID=2369)

- **2nd**
[Expeditious Excavation](/Spells.aspx?ID=2349)

- **8th**
[Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=1507)

</column>
name: Magrim (The Taskmaster)
